mapper.insert: INSERT INTO target (mile_no, user_no, start_date, end_date, target_mileage, is_together, is_manager_plan) VALUES (#{mileNo}, #{userNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{targetMileage}, #{isTogether}, #{isManagerPlan})

INSERT INTO user_target (user_no, target_no, mile_no, start_date, end_date, target_mileage, is_together) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{targetNo}, #{mileNo}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{targetMileage}, #{isTogether})
